name: Blockstack
description: This module allows you to save your Gladys parameters inside Blockstack Decentralized storage, Gaia.
instructionsHTML:
• You need Gladys in a version >= 3.12.1.

  • Go to the Modules tab in Gladys, then install this module on the store. Restart Gladys.

  • Go to the Modules tab in Gladys, then click on the Configuration button of the BlockStack module.

  • You can now login with your BlockStack account

  • You should be able to login, save your home preferences in Blockstack and re-import it back when needed.
instructionsMarkDown:
- You need Gladys in a version >= 3.12.1.

- Go to the `Modules` tab in Gladys, then install this module on the store. Restart Gladys.

- Go to the `Modules` tab in Gladys, then click on the `Configuration` button of the BlockStack module. 

![Configuration Step 1 Blockstack Gladys](https://github.com/GladysAssistant/gladys-blockstack/raw/master/screenshots/step-1.jpg)

- You can now login with your BlockStack account

![Configuration Step 2 Blockstack Gladys](https://github.com/GladysAssistant/gladys-blockstack/raw/master/screenshots/step-2.jpg)

- You should be able to login, save your home preferences in Blockstack and re-import it back when needed.

![Configuration Step 3 Blockstack Gladys](https://github.com/GladysAssistant/gladys-blockstack/raw/master/screenshots/step-3.jpg)
